I love a good clinic day! I'm finally getting in the groove of post-PhD life #ClinicIsMyFave #LoveMyJob #LifeAfterPhD #slpeeps

Thanks @tricmc and @wespeechies. It takes a village to do a #PhD. So much support from colleagues, friends, and fam. Stoked to have made it

Curious - Using tech to identify empathy in therapists. Just cited by co-auth Narayanan at #SST2016 https://t.co/D6Dx9vZ9KS
Narayanan presenting great info quantifying the craft of Ax with chil'n with #ASD. Psych behav in Ax correlated w chld behav & sev #SST2016
Computational analysis identified how psychologists modify interactions with child'n with ASD #SST2016
Narayanan: speech processing and machine learning are key enablers #SST2016
Interesting problem - how do we quantify human behaviour? To ensure objective interpretation of behaviours ... #SST2016
Using machine learning to support behavioural analysis #sst2016 interplay btw engineering & behav analysis.
Excited for #sst2016. First up Shri Narayanan re: behavioral informatics & sp/lang

We need to improve and change they ways we communicate health information #SARRAH2016
Beaver: health literacy infographic https://t.co/oLkpNAsgIN #SARRAH2016
Linda Beaver re: health literacy in Aus #sarrah2016 - 59% of australian adults have a less than average understanding of health information

Sarah Powell https://t.co/fzipQXNLsO - revitalising rural communities #SARRAH2016
Amazing start to Day 2 of #sarrah2016
Grimmer: "the medical model doesn't fit what we do & we need to promote what we do" #sarrah2016 #slpeeps
Grimmer: consolidate scarse funding and facilitate multicentre research #slpeeps #SARRAH2016
Implementation and intensity!! We need more utilisation research, #slpeeps. #SARRAH2016
Grimmer: there is limited evidence of best practice care by AHPs #sarrah2016 #slpeeps
What are the "practice points" that #slpeeps value in the absence of research evidence? #sarrah2016
Prof Grimmer: importance of allied health leading healthcare reform #sarrah2016
Grimmer: systematic reviews don't answer utilisation questions. More research in to utilisation req #sarrah2016 #slpeeps
YES!!! Grimmer identifying the issues re: equating EBP with RCT in allied health practice. #sarrah2016 #slpeeps
Grimmer presenting an Evidence Informed Practice model #sarrah2016 #slpeeps
Grimmer: increasing systematic reviews and practice guidelines support EBP #SARRAH2016
Amazing start to #SARRAH2016: measuring outcomes, health economics, and peer reviewing of clinical education #slpeeps #FoodForThought

BÃ©rubÃ©: higher deletion and substitution errors in French polysyllables #ICPLA2016

Interestingly, Manitoba French has fewer polysyllables (15%) than English (~29%) #ICPLA2016
